value.label: Work on the premises will be substantially finished before the end of the extension period
Reasonable progress towards the construction of the premises will be made by the end of the extension period
A substantial amount will be spent by the approved provider, in connection with the work on the premises, to meet the conditions to which the allocation was subject.
If work on the premises has been delayed by circumstances beyond the approved provider’s control – work on the premises will proceed satisfactorily within a reasonable period.
